Text.Value: Where did you keep the letters?
... we have... no one... only... each other...
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
I want to help Scratch. How can I calm him?
Why were you in the forest?
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
I've taken Scratch in. Is there anyone I can take him to?
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

Synopsis: Using Speak with Dead, we are able to talk to the spirit of Gomwick. He was killed by a band of gnolls, but managed to save his dog, Scratch, by forcing him to flee.
